pertinentSupportingInfo.value: Chest pain on exertion. Lasts for 5 minutes & is relieved immediately by GTN. Patient has had 6 occurences in the last 2 weeks

Observation.value: Normal Lung Fields. Cardiothoracic ratio within normal limits
Significant ischaemic changes in antero-lateral fields

pertinentCareEventCommentary.value: Follow-up planned for fasting glucose and lipid tests

code.originalText: Chest pain advice leaflet given and explained (id code HI 75646)

pertinentDosageInstructions.value: Take one tablet daily for the next 7 days
